system.description: A brilliant divine radiance surrounds the subjects (one per level in 20-ft. radius). Four effects: (1) +4 deflection to AC and +4 resistance on saves (vs. all attacks). (2) SR 25 against evil spells and spells cast by evil creatures. (3) Blocks possession and mental influence as protection from evil. (4) If an evil creature hits a warded creature with a melee attack, the attacker is blinded (Fortitude negates).

components.materialDescription: A tiny reliquary worth at least 500 gp containing a sacred relic (focus).

system.target: One creature/level in 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you
